header_text: You are at a family gathering. One of your relatives asks you to pass their phone near you to them. Lately, you've been more uncoordinated, and you're worried that your handoff will be clumsy.

elements.Text: Did you have any trouble handing over the phone?

elements.name: You are at a family gathering. One of your relatives asks you to pass their phone near you to them. Lately, you've been more uncoordinated, and you're worried that your handoff will be clumsy._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
